page.shortlink: form layout image properties image display heightwidth property
page.description: Specify the display width or height of the image. Use CSS syntax (e.g. 300px) - but not percentages (e.g. you cannot use '50%').

discussion.p: The *[ui:Image display height/width]* property is only used if the image has the 'Allow image annotation' property turned on. This property overrides any height or width setting in the image inline style or class.
